Karen Chui

Photographer, DJ and entrepreneur.

About me

Hi, I'm Karen

Photographer, DJ and entrepreneur. Born in Canada but raised mainly in Hong Kong, currently studying in Birmingham. I have always found myself drawn to exploring the wonders that the visual and musical arts have to offer. This page is simply a portfolio of my work so that it doesn't remain hidden on a laptop drive somewhere.

Photography

Peru, Chile, Bolivia.
During my elective travels at the end of my fourth year as a medical student, I explored parts of South America. During my time I visited various local attractions, wandered the mountains and celebrated the Fiesta del Espíritu Santo in the Plaza De Armas in Cusco. This album is a collection of those travels and the people I met.
Previous Travels
I have been fortunate enough to travel to many places, experience vibrant cultures and explore some incredible parts of the world. Though a more jumbled album, this is a collection of those travels.
The Retreat
In May 2015, I went to a Ayahuasca retreat in a forest situated along the Amazon river. This experience was one of the most enlightening of my life. The people who I connected with as a result of this experience continue to remain in my life now. The Shaman and helpers were spiritual guides to our journey throughout the ceremonies. This album is both a dedication to those who were part of my journey and an attempt to portray the significance of the week for those involved.
